Header.title: EDucated Guess
Header.paragraph: No job is too small, so please take a look at the services offered and give me a call.

paragraph: I am a retired registered professional engineer with over 40 years in the manufacturing industry in various project management and executive positions.  In addition, over the course of these years, I have completed various repairs and home renovations, including bathroom and laundry room renos.

Most recently I managed the complete renovation of an upscale hair salon, undertaking a majority of the work myself (see Gallery tab).  I also upgraded a bungalow for resale earlier in 2020, achieving an offer price far above asking.
In an attempt to help seniors to “stay in place”, I am focusing my skills and services to the seniors’ community.
Educated Guess is the “operating as” name for the Ontario incorporated company Blackburn Development Corporation.

Services.name: Changing light fixtures, receptacles and switches

Testimonials.text: Ed was the perfect addition to our open, as we could have never done it without him. With having no idea where to start with the renovations, he effortlessly managed beginning to end. From coordinating and assembling our furniture deliveries, to managing our plumbing and electrical trades - there was no task he couldn’t handle. We even had a surprise leak that he fixed, leaving us with a worry-free mindset. We absolutely recommend Ed and will absolutely work with him for future maintenance of our space as he has always been reliable, trustworthy and efficient.
Testimonials.name: Erin and Julie - Owners of The Fawn Collective, hair lounge, Waterloo

Testimonials.text: Very pleased with his professionalism and the quality of Ed's work.  Happy to recommend -- great service and helped us find ideas that worked in our space. High-quality work, very reasonable prices, did an excellent job.
Testimonials.name: Patty, Stratford

Testimonials.text: I was in that "end of a renovation" state when Ed showed up to help me with all of the finishing touches. It really helped me settle in and made the house functional again.
Testimonials.name: Susan, Stratford

Testimonials.text: In 2018 I needed some major renovations done to my condo and Ed was the handyman who did it all.   I found him to be conscientious, professional and knowledgeable.    I wouldn't hesitate to use him again or recommend him to my friends.
Testimonials.name: Diane, Paris
